attributes.action: MPs should represent their constituents views, not their own political aims.
attributes.background:
MPs should represent their constituents views, not their own personal ones. If they won’t represent their constituents they should have stand down.

We are supposedly a domocratic country so our MPs should respect that.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because MPs are accountable to their constituents and how they choose to represent their constituency is their responsibility and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
